description: This file defines a React component for managing connectors, including listing, creating, and deleting connectors, with UI elements and API interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of connectors from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a connector by ID after user confirmation and reloads the list.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new connector, updating UI state accordingly.
